description: Unique identifier for a configuration setting attached to an integration.
Foreign key linking the configuration entry to a specific integration/provider.
Identifier of the configuration parameter definition. Likely a foreign key to a configuration key catalog; confirm with SME.
Stored value for the configuration parameter. May contain text or numeric data and, when sensitive, is protected or masked.
Flags whether this configuration parameter is required for the integration to operate.
Flags whether the parameter value is sensitive and should be encrypted or hidden in UI and logs.
Defines the display or processing order of configuration parameters for the integration.
